name: MDLVertexDescriptor
desc: A description of the structure, format, and layout for vertex data buffers associated with a mesh.

items.name: var attributes: NSMutableArray
items.desc: The list of vertex attributes described by the vertex descriptor.

items.name: func attributeNamed(String) -> MDLVertexAttribute?
items.desc: Returns the vertex attribute with the specified name in the vertex descriptor.

items.name: func addOrReplaceAttribute(MDLVertexAttribute)
items.desc: Adds the specified vertex attribute to the vertex descriptor, replacing any existing attribute with the same name.

items.name: func setPackedOffsets()
items.desc: Sets the offset for each vertex attribute to the minimum value to pack vertex data together in a single buffer.

items.name: var layouts: NSMutableArray
items.desc: The list of vertex buffer layouts described by the vertex descriptor.

items.name: func setPackedStrides()
items.desc: Sets the stride for each vertex layout to the minimum value to pack vertex data together in a single buffer.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Resets a vertex descriptor to its default state.

items.name: init(vertexDescriptor: MDLVertexDescriptor)
items.desc: Creates a new vertex descriptor by performing a deep copy of the specified vertex descriptor.
